duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diagnostic tests, repairs, and preventative maintenance on drill rig hydraulic, electrical, and mechanical systems.
Provide on-site and in-house heavy equipment repair services using fully-equipped service trucks.
Communicate with customers to understand their needs and explain repair procedures.
Maintain detailed work orders and inventory controls, and operate forklifts, cranes, and other machinery to load/unload equipment.

education_certification.credential: 2+ years experience repairing heavy construction/drilling equipment.
